metaDescription:
7shifts is a team management software designed for restaurants. We help managers and operators spend less time and effort scheduling their staff, reduce their monthly labor costs and improve team communication. The result is simplified team management, one shift at a time.

7shifts also offers free mobile apps (iOS and Android) allowing managers and employees to have everything at their fingertips.

Start your free trial or request a demo at www.7shifts.com.
apiDescription:
7shifts is a team management software designed for restaurants. We help managers and operators spend less time and effort scheduling their staff, reduce their monthly labor costs and improve team communication. The result is simplified team management, one shift at a time.

7shifts also offers free mobile apps (iOS and Android) allowing managers and employees to have everything at their fingertips.

Start your free trial or request a demo at www.7shifts.com.

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Return companies that have been modified since the specified date. Format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Return locations that have been modified since the specified date. Format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: deleted
parameters.description: When TRUE the search will return deleted locations

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for the next or previous page of results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results desired per page.

parameters.name: formatted_address
parameters.example: 701 Broadway Ave #200, MadeUpCity, SK SVN 1C3, Canada

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Return departments that have been modified since the specified date. Format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for the next or previous page of results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results desired per page.

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: Return departments that match the provided location ID

parameters.name: transferTo
parameters.description: Department ID to move roles and shifts to

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Return roles that have been modified since the specified date. Format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for the next or previous page of results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results desired per page.

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Return users that have been modified since the specified date. Format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: Location ID (cannot be used in conjunction with Department ID and Role ID)

parameters.name: departmentId
parameters.description: Department ID (cannot be used in conjunction with Location ID and Role ID)

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description: Role ID (cannot be used in conjunction with Location ID and Department ID)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by partial or full employee name

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort the paginated result by the given field and direction.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for the next or previous page of results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results desired per page.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: User ID. Accepted values are 7shifts user id or punch id. Use prefix punch: for punch id

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for the next or previous page of results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results desired per page.

parameters.name: shiftIds
parameters.description: A comma separated list of Shift IDs

parameters.name: start[lte]
parameters.description: Return shifts that start before or on specified date. In ISO8601 Format

parameters.name: start[gte]
parameters.description: Return shifts that start after or on specified date time. In ISO8601 Format

parameters.name: end[lte]
parameters.description: Return shifts that end before or on specified date time. In ISO8601 Format

parameters.name: end[gte]
parameters.description: Return shifts that end after or on specified date time. In ISO8601 Format

parameters.name: deleted
parameters.description: Return shifts that were published and have been deleted. Cannot be combined with draft.

parameters.name: draft
parameters.description: Return shifts that are in draft. Draft shifts have created, edited or deleted but not been published. Overrides deleted flag.

parameters.name: includeDraft
parameters.description: Return shifts that are published, and also shifts in draft. Overrides deleted flag and draft flag.

parameters.name: open
parameters.description: Return shifts that are open. Open shifts means anyone can request to take it and not assigned to any individual.

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Return only shifts that have been modified from specified date time. In ISO8601 Format

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort by either start or end

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: Return the shift even if its deleted

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specified user_id of the user to check if scheduled. If the value begins with punch_id: then this specifies a user punch_id.

parameters.name: approved
parameters.description: Returns time punches that have been approved. Default null, returns both approved and unapproved punches. If true returns only approved punches. If false returns only unapproved punches.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit of results that will be returned.

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Return time punches that have been modified after the specified date time. UTC in ISO8601 Format

parameters.name: clockedIn[lte]
parameters.description: Return time punches with clocked in before or on the specified date.  UTC in ISO8601 format

parameters.name: clockedIn[gte]
parameters.description: Return time punches with clocked in after or on the specified date.  UTC in ISO8601 format

parameters.name: clockedOut[lte]
parameters.description: Return time punches with clocked out before or on the specified date.  UTC in ISO8601 format

parameters.name: clockedOut[gte]
parameters.description: Return time punches with clocked out after or on the specified date.  UTC in ISO8601 format

parameters.name: deleted
parameters.description: Returns punches filtered by deleted status.  Default false, returns undeleted punches. If true returns only deleted punches. if value is null then returns both deleted and undeleted punches.

parameters.name: localizeSearchTime
parameters.description: If true, convert any date ranges to consider the local timezone of the punches.  If false, date ranges will be in UTC

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for the next or previous page of results.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The name of the field and direction you want the results ordered by.

parameters.name: receiptDate[gte]
parameters.description: Return receipts that were created on or after a specific date

parameters.name: receiptDate[lte]
parameters.description: Return receipts that were created on or before a specific date

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Return receipts that were modified on or after a specific date

parameters.name: externalUserId
parameters.description: Filter receipts by external user id

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: An opaque cursor for the next or previous result set.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results desired per page.

parameters.name: receiptId
parameters.description: Receipt ID.  Either 7shifts receipt UUID or a combination of the External ID of the sales receipt in your system and a Location ID. External ID's must start with 'ext:' and the format is ext:location_id:receipt_id.

parameters.name: receiptDate[gte]
parameters.description: Return receipts that were created on or after a specific date. Limit to 31-day range with receipt_date[lte].

parameters.name: receiptDate[lte]
parameters.description: Return receipts that were created on or before a specific date. Limit to 31-day range with receipt_date[gte].

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Return receipts that were modified on or after a specific date. Limited to past 30 days.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: User ID. Accepted values are 7Shifts user id, external user id or user email address. Use prefix ext: for external id or email: for email address

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: User ID. Accepted values are 7Shifts user id or external user id. Use prefix ext: for external id

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: User ID. Accepted values are 7Shifts user id or external user id. Use prefix ext: for external id

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Return records that have been modified since the specified date. Format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for the next or previous page of results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results desired per page.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: A date string to request only events within a range.  Format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: A date string to request only events within a range.  Format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.example: Daily for 10 occurrences ==> (1997 9:00 AM EDT) September 2-11 DTSTART;TZID=America/New_York:19970902T090000 RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;COUNT=10

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start of the targeted range for recurrence. Format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: List only posts containing the message

parameters.name: orderField
parameters.description: Order listed log book posts by a field

parameters.name: orderDir

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Starting date for which you want the report to start.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Ending date for which you want the report to end.

parameters.name: startDate

parameters.name: endDate

repositoryDescription: 7shifts: Restaurant team management software simplifying scheduling, reducing costs, and enhancing communication. Free mobile apps for on-the-go access. Start your trial at www.7shifts.com. 7shifts's {language} SDK generated by Konfig (https://konfigthis.com/).
